rationale: Custom Button and Input components use focus:ring-offset-2 which creates a 2px offset using the page background color. On dark theme (bg-dark-surface: #0a0d0a), the default white offset creates a jarring visual gap. Some components also lack visible focus states entirely.
problemSolved: Button component (line 185) uses focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 but no ring-offset-color. Input (line 292) has focus:ring-2 but inconsistent styling. SelectTrigger (line 843) and other interactive elements use various focus styles. The default ring-offset-color is white which contrasts poorly with dark surface (#0a0d0a).
